replies.body: can anyone give me some terrible earth puns?

This new champ, Taliyah, will rock your world with her ground-breaking new kit!  But don't quake in fear: rather than being a stone-cold killer, she's a down-to-earth teen with budding potential who's not afraid to get her hands dirty.  She probably likes rock bands with gravelly vocalists, or the kind with a light tremor in their voice.  She's a diamond in the rough, and you sure won't find her living in any glass houses.  She _could_ kill two birds, but she has a heart of gold.  She may not be the most experienced in her field, but she's boulder than you think and can still rock the house when played in toph lane.  But if there's a fight mid she's only a stone's throw away thanks to her ult.
Um, I'd imagine she gets along with Galio and Malphite pretty well...

I think that's all I got for now; I might unearth more later.

I could dig up a couple more.

It's not her fault that you're stuck between a rock and a hard place.  Talk to her, find common ground, and start with a clean slate.  Fix the rift between you.  If you soil this relationship, your name is mud.

Logged in just to upvote.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Toph lane. I love you.
You win an entire internet my good fellow.
those are some gneiss puns.
in Toph lane hahaha

Yeah. So, Taliyah tears up the Earth right?
Well, here's your **tear**able Earth pun.

MERCY PLZZZZZZZZ
(ty) :D

anyone else got anymore?

I would, but its just as TERRAble

I have a list of 19 Shen puns I made myself if you're ever in need.
Do tell more

> [{quoted}](name=Doctor Grimm,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=51XyjEi1,comment-id=001b0000000100000000,timestamp=2016-05-06T00:45:31.856+0000)
>
> Do tell more

Almost all of my board posts and game comments are derived from this list I keep. Enjoy!

Shenpai (Senpai)
Shentai (hentai)
Gentleshen (gentleman)
Shenchman (Henchman)
Fresh-shen (freshen)
Heath-shen (heathen)
Au-shen-tic (authentic)
Shen (Shin)
Shen't (shouldn't)
Appre-shend (apprehend)
Surr-shen-der (surrender)
Devasta-shen (devastation)
Arch-shen-emy (archenemy)
Compre-shend (comprehend)
Shen-anigans (shenanigans)
AND HIS NAME IS JHIN SHENAAAA! (the only one I'm ashamed of)
Shense (sense)
Revolu-shen-ary (revolutionary)
Expecta-shen (expectation)
Aggrava-shen (aggravation)
Leg-shen-dary (legendary)
Atten-shen (Attention)
Shen-sational (sensational)
The fact that she's not hot is just sad coming from riot games.
but it changes the stereotype
I think she's kinda cute. And she could definitely kick peoples ass, so that's a plus. She's the kind of girl where if a guy is talking shit you just step back and let her handle it.
theres a bunch of krepos here... shes just 16 btw.
Yeah,  And most of us are just 16 btw
She _is_ cute, she may not be the standard of "cute" in America. That's just the u.s. though, other parts of the world find this attractive.
{{champion:421}} {{champion:203}} {{champion:420}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:222}} it does "change" from the stereotype
Upvoted for your nam
Depends on your definition of "hot".
{{champion:103}} (Foxfire) {{champion:63}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:89}} are all pretty damn hot.
{{champion:6}} is pretty hot
{{champion:6}}  is sexy bro

Also Scorchd Earth {{champion:58}} and Infernal {{champion:75}}
If {{champion:1}}'s eight, I'm eight. ;)
oh
her freckles tho. I've got a champ crush on her already cause of the freckles.

I'm glad they didn't make her like the same stereotype champs where their perfect. That they have huge boobs, light skin,and/or colorful hair. I love that Riot didn't do that bs this time, shes still pretty for those of you that say shes ugly {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Yet they make male champs with stereotypes and it's fine right?

{{champion:266}} {{champion:12}} {{champion:32}} {{champion:63}} {{champion:31}} {{champion:42}} {{champion:36}} {{champion:202}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:85}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:96}} {{champion:90}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:56}} {{champion:20}} {{champion:2}} {{champion:80}} {{champion:33}} {{champion:58}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:68}} {{champion:13}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:27}} {{champion:72}} The list goes on and on. There are way fewer male champions that conform to a stereotype than female ones.
in terms of appearance i'll grant they aren't stereotypical for the most part, but in terms of their personality? hoooo boy, stereotypical and one-note as all hell
Rule 34 is still a thing tho.

It is. I wish we didn't need these weird rules though. (Why do we need to restate the obvious? We should just let it be as much as possible.)

And complaining about the appearance of a character doesn't make sense. Not everything needs to pander to ('x' person's) idea of beauty. (Simultaneously, please realize that Taliyah is bound to be at least one person's ideal girl. It's just the way humans work.)

LOL "Then it hit us," says ZenonTheStoic. "What about an earth mage from Shurima? The idea seemed like fertile ground."
More like "What about an Earth bender from Avatar"{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

Or Tera from DC Comics
Or earth Spirit from dota
Or the fact that the Earth mage concept extends further than Avatar.
Geomancers in Final Fanasty as well

Toph wasn't from a desert though. If you recall, Toph was useless nearly the entire time they were in the desert, all because she could not figure out how to bend the sand. Taliyah has no such problems. Not to mention Azir is also an earth bender with TONS of control.
i can see taliyah and illaoi getting along nicely. after all motion is key
"Traditonal" ... earthbender ... ok riot XD
You know that the entire concept of 'magic' and 'Earthbending' in general is a tradition from godknowshowlongago, right? Also, Earthbenders extend beyond Avatar.
No, you guys got it all wrong. She's a sandwhich.
You know that her moveset is entirely based of earthbending right? You know that the ultimate is taken from Toph right?

Or look at nami, summoning tidal waves is pretty stereotypical, but fitting.
and yasuo, he does fight like aang would with a sword, but no way in HELL are they similar.
Yasuo has hair.
Sombreros and Witch hats are very different though
